articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Exploring people management topics through data and their analysis
articles.contents:
Based on advice from more experienced colleagues in the data-science community, I decided to set up my own blog about people analytics topics, so I can at least partially give back what I’ve learned myself through the blogging of others. Besides that, it also gives me an opportunity – and, honestly, a bit of an excuse – to explore and try new things related to people analytics, while at the same time better organizing my thoughts about the subject.
On this blog, I plan to publish articles (mainly in English, but from time to time also in Czech) that will focus more on the technical and analytic aspects of people analytics. Nevertheless, I’ll always try to present individual topics in the context of practical issues that keep HR professionals busy as they work to enhance both efficiency and effectiveness of HR processes in organizations. In general, my goal is to promote the idea that when critical thinking, reliable and relevant data, and rigorous analysis are combined in people management, organizations stand a much better chance of achieving their strategic and business goals through and with their people.
The views and opinions presented on this blog are solely my own and do not necessarily reflect those of any of my current or former employers.

articles.title: Bio
articles.contents: I’m a psychologist who’s on pretty good terms with mathematics and statistics. In the past, as a researcher and lecturer at the Department of Psychology at Charles University in Prague, I relied on both disciplines to study and teach the workings of the human mind. Now, as a people & data scientist, I use them to help organizations improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their people-related processes. You can find more about me on my LinkedIn profile. In addition to this blog, I’ve also shared some people analytics–related stuff on my GitHub page. Feel free to contact me at ludek.stehlik@gmail.com.
